网格空间[px, -1 for auto]

Grid Space

The amount of space in px between grid items.

items.helpvalue:
两端对齐布局

Justified Layout Settings

Use the justified method to create neat layouts with images of different aspects. Justified layout will scale images to fit within specified row target height, allowing elegant layouts that fill the available space. Justified layout works for both GALLERY and FOLDERS modules.

* Justified layout is not compatible with meta-data (title, description etc), unless you use captions-overlay or tooltip.

* The justified layout is responsive by nature, since images will fill each row at whatever width is available.

items.title:
行高 [px]

Target Row Height

Set a target row-height, where images will be scaled within. The larger the target-height, the larger the images are, but fewer images will fit inside each row.

* The justified layout will calculate height of each row based on target-height and the amount- and aspect of images inside. Sometimes, you may get an orphan-image on a separate row at the bottom.

空间 [px]

Space

Space in px between items in the justified layout.

items.inlinetitle:
Disable on small mobile devices

Disable justified grid on small mobile devices

Since the justified grid often stacks images vertically on small mobile devices anyway, it may be unnecessary to process them in a justified layout. Furthermore, it is often easier for visitors on small mobile devices to simply scroll through images stacked vertically.

* Images will stack vertically on small mobile devices.
* Justified layout will still work on tablets 700px and up.
* This setting may be beneficial for galleries with several hundred images.

items.helpvalue:
列布局

Columns Layout

Use the columns method to create a vertical masonry-style layout which emphasizes portrait aspect images. This layout will scale images within the columns to allow an elegant layout which fills the space available.

items.inlinetitle:
使用宽度

Use Width

This setting allow you to set a target-width for columns in the columns layout. The value applied here decides the amount of columns that are able to fit into the width of the parent container. * We strongly recommend using this setting for the columns layout, because it allows a responsive layout with less columns on smaller devices.

items.title:
列宽 [px]

Column Width

* This setting only applies if use width is enabled.

Set a target-width for columns in the columns layout. The value applied here decides the amount of columns that are able to fit into the available width of the parent container.

列

Columns

* This setting only applies if use width is disabled.

Set the amount of columns to stack items within.

空间[px, -1 for auto]

Space

Space in px between items in the columns layout.

items.helpvalue:
轮播布局

Carousel Layout

The carousel method displays multiple items in a carousel-like layout, supporting swipe, keyboard and video. You would normally use a wide layout, and image crop for the carousel.

items.title:
数量

Carousel Amount

Set the amount of carousel items to display simultaneously on screen.

items.inlinetitle:
使用高度

Carousel Use Height

This setting attempts to resize image based on height, so that they fit into the carousel without having to apply crop to the images for uniform sizes. * This setting is experimental. We recommend leaving disabled, and using carousel-amount with an image crop.

items.title:
目标高度 [px]

Carousel Target Height

* This setting only applies when use height is enabled.

Set a target height for images in the carousel.

空间 [px]

Carousel Space

Space in px between items in the carousel.

自动播放间隔 [milliseconds, 0 = autoplay disabled]

Carousel Interval

Set the carousel to autoplay, so it slides to next items after a specified interval (ms). The Interval value should be in milliseconds, so 3000 means 3 second intervals.

Set value to 0 to disable autoplay.

items.inlinetitle:
显示计时器

Carousel Show Timer

When in autoplay mode, shows an animated visual element representing the interval.

懒加载

Carousel Interval

Lazy-load images as they come into view, instead of preloading all images on page-load. This setting should be enable if you have dozens of images in your carousel. If there are only a few, you should perhaps disable for better loading performance.

背景

Carousel Background

Adds a subtle background behind the carousel, which helps it stand out. Useful if you are using large space between items.

显示导航

Carousel Show Nav

Show the carousel navigation items: arrows and dots. You would only disable this option if you have enabled autoplay.

显示标签

Show Tabs

When enabled, tab buttons will be created for each image in the carousel [see demo]. Although carousel with tabs has several limitations, it can be very useful to create an interactive timeline-effect for small groups of images.

Carousel Tabs Info

  • When tabs are enabled, carousel amount will always be set to 1, since tabs only support a single active item visible on screen.
  • Tabs work best with a small amount of images so that tabs fit on a single row.
  • Tabs should normally be used with the Split View gallery setting as in the demo.
  • Remember to add title and/or description to items when using split view.
  • Tabs are populated by image name, not title. This is because image titles are often too long, and will display in the carousel anyway. Tab titles should be short and accurate.
  • Unless all your images are the same aspect, you should use the Crop Images setting (for example 3:2) to achieve a uniform carousel layout. If images are at different size, the carousel will scale to the size of the tallest image in the carousel, which will leave a lot of empty space.

循环

Carousel Loop

Stich the carousel at end-points, so that it seemingly loops.

items.helpvalue:
幻灯片布局

Gallery Slideshow Layout

The slideshow is a powerful gallery layout that supports touchscreen gestures, keyboard, thumbnails, autoplay, fullscreen, video and much more. The slideshow method comes with comprehensive settings to account for a variety of layout combinations.

* The slideshow can be used in combination with the menu-absolute class, for an elegant startpage.

* The slideshow should normally be used with the wide gallery module width.

items.title:
宽 [% or px]

Slideshow Width

Width of the slideshow inside the gallery module. Should normally be set to 100%, which allows the slideshow to take 100% of the gallery module width.

高 [% or px]

Slideshow Height

Height of the slideshow inside the gallery module. Unlike the width setting, 100% height indicates that the slideshow should take 100% height of device viewport.

比率 [留空 = 禁用]

Slideshow Ratio

If enabled, ratio will override the height setting, and instead set the height of slideshow based on width and the aspect ratio setting. The advantage of this setting, is that it can make sure the slideshow retains a specific aspect ratio across all screen sizes, even handheld devices with different vertical orientation.

* Ratio can be added in two ways:

2/1 This gives a 2-to-1 wide aspect ratio.

2 This is the same as above.

1/2 This gives a 1-to-2 tall aspect ratio.

0.5 This is the same as above.

4/3 This gives a 4-to-3 wide aspect ratio.

1.33 This is the same as above.

导航

Slideshow Nav

Set slideshow navigation items, which appear below the slideshow.

固定

Slideshow Fit

This option decides how images scale within the available slideshow stage. Normally, you will choose between the cover or contain settings.

cover Will scale images so they cover the entire slideshow stage. This looks elegant, but will often hide small parts of the image outside of the stage, so that it fits nicely. This effect is especially suitable for the startpage.

contain This setting will scale images so they fit within the slideshow stage area without hiding parts of the image. This ensures the image is entirely visible, but there will be empty gaps either above/below or left/right of the image.

scaledown This is the same as the cover-setting, except it will never scale images up.

none With this setting, slideshow images will not get scaled. This is NOT recommended, because if it does not scale down images on small devices, the may become entirely un-viewable.

过渡

Slideshow Transition

Choose between a few different slideshow transition effects. Default is slide for a dynamic direction-aware effect, but if you want something more subtle, try crossfade or dissolve.

过渡时间 [milliseconds]

Transition Duration

Sets the duration of the slideshow transition, in milliseconds.

items.inlinetitle:
显示字幕

Slideshow Captions

Show image captions at the bottom of slideshow.

字幕悬停

Captions Hover

Only display image captions on mouse hover.

循环

Slideshow Loop

When enabled, the slideshow will loop seamlessly between last and first image.

自动播放

Slideshow Autoplay

When enabled, the slideshow will start in play-mode without user-intervention.

items.title:
计时器 [milliseconds]

Slideshow Interval

Set the interval between slides when in play-mode, in milliseconds.

items.inlinetitle:
开启全屏

Slideshow Start Fullscreen

When enabled, the page slideshow will start in fullscreen mode once the page is loaded. * Fullscreen-mode in this context means it will occupy the full browser stage area, but it will not hi-jack the entire screen. This is not possible, because native fullscreen mode requires user-click from browsers for safety reasons.

切换播放

Slideshow Toggle Play

Show the toggle-play button, which overlays the slideshow. If you disable this option, the visitor will have no means to start- or stop the slideshow (which in some cases, may be acceptable).

历史哈希

Slideshow History Hash

When enabled, the slideshow will add a image ID #hashtag in the URL when navigating images. This allows deep-linking to images inside the slideshow. This option is disabled on touch devices, because it forces the browser URL bar to become visible for each slide, which can be very annoying.

显示计时器

Show Timer

When in play-mode, a visual timer bar displays under the slideshow, indicating how long until next slide is ready to display.

items.title: 包括

items.helpvalue:
一些设置包括在页面模块中的类和内容.

Include Settings

Unlike module-specific settings, anything you add here will always be included for each page, and cannot be changed- or removed on a per-page basis.

What's the point of this?

If you change module classes on a per-page basis, it will cancel out all the module's default classes. If you want some classes to persist, even when changing classes per-page, you can add them here.

items.title:
体类 [tags]

Body Classes

* Add items by typing them in, and hitting enter/return or comma on keyboard.

Add persistent body tag classes here, which will always be included for each page.

模块类 [tags]

Module Classes

* Add items by typing them in, and hitting enter/return or comma on keyboard.

Add persistent classes to all page modules (context, folders and gallery), which will be included for each page.

上下文类 [tags]

Context Classes

* Add items by typing them in, and hitting enter/return or comma on keyboard.

Add persistent classes to the context page module.

文件夹类 [tags]

Folders Classes

* Add items by typing them in, and hitting enter/return or comma on keyboard.

Add persistent classes to the folders page module.

画廊类 [tags]

Gallery Classes

* Add items by typing them in, and hitting enter/return or comma on keyboard.

Add persistent classes to the gallery page module.

内容前添加 [html]

Content Prepend

Here you can prepend html to the main page content for all pages.

内容后追加 [html]

Content Append

Here you can append html to the main page content for all pages.
图像

items.helpvalue:
为所有图片设置默认标题、说明和链接. Why?

Image Defaults

Sometimes it may be useful to assign a global default title and/or description for your images. * You can also set image defaults from page settings, specifically for the page..

Usage Examples

This feature could be used to set a default ©copyright in the title for all your images, so you don't need to add it for every image. Optionally, you can use the prepend or append settings to include defaults into your unique titles and descriptions. For example, you may want to prepend an icon at the beginning of all image titles, or append a link at the end.

items.title:
默认图像标题

Default Image Title

Use this setting to set an optional default title for all your images.

default
When set to default, the default title will only display for images that don't have a unique title assigned.

prepend
When set to prepend, the default title will be prepended to your image title. * If your image title is empty, default title will still be prepended.

append
When set to append, the default title will be appended to your image title. * If your image title is empty, default title will still be appended.

Some html allowed

You are allowed to use the following html tags in image titles:
<code><a><span><em><i><b><strong><small><s>

Dynamic Values

You can use the following values in default titles, which are replaced dynamically. This may be helpful if you are including file names, or links that refer to the image name.

{file_name_ext} is replaced by the file name.
{file_name} is replaced by the file name without extension.
{path} is replaced by the file path of current folder.
{image_path} is replaced by the path to the image.

默认的图像描述

Default Image Description

Use this setting to set an optional default description for all your images.

default
When set to default, the default description will only display for images that don't have a unique description assigned.

prepend
When set to prepend, the default description will be prepended to your image description. * If your image description is empty, default description will still be prepended.

append
When set to append, the default description will be appended to your image description. * If your image description is empty, default description will still be appended.

Some html allowed

You are allowed to use the following html tags in image descriptions:
<a><span><em><i><b><strong><small><s><br><mark><img><kbd><code><button>

Dynamic Values

You can use the following values in default descriptions, which are replaced dynamically. This may be helpful if you are including file names, or links that refer to the image name.

{file_name_ext} is replaced by the file name.
{file_name} is replaced by the file name without extension.
{path} is replaced by the file path of current folder.
{image_path} is replaced by the path to the image.

默认图像链接

Default Image Link

If you set an image link, clicking an image will open the link instead of the image. Use this setting to apply a default link to all your images.

* It is highly unlikely you would want to use this setting, unless you want all your images to link to an external resource based on dynamic values (see below).

Dynamic Values

You can use the following variables in your links, which are replaced dynamically:

{file_name_ext} is replaced by the file name.
{file_name} is replaced by the file name without extension.
{path} is replaced by the file path of current folder.
{image_path} is replaced by the path to the image.

默认图像链接目标

Default Link Target

Target decides in what window to open the link. Use this setting to set the default link target for all your image links. * Default link target only applies for images which have been assigned a link, and only if they have not been assigned a unique link target from the gallery.

auto Automatically determines target depending on the link.
_self Opens the link in the same window.
_blank Opens the link in a new window (normally a new tab).
popup window Opens the link in a popup window.
X3 popup Opens link in native X3 popup. * Good for Youtube embeds, images and simple content, but should not be used when linking to full websites.

items.helpvalue:
默认弹出窗口大小 [width, height]

Default Popup Window Size

This setting decides the default width and height of the optional popup window target for image links. Popup window size only applies for images which have been assigned a link set to popup target.

* Popup will downsize to fit the device screen.
页面插件
页面插件是可以从页面设置中应用的特殊功能。从这里，您可以为您的页面插件设置默认值.

items.title: 页面介绍

items.helpvalue: 使用页面介绍插件在页面顶部包含图像、颜色或渐变. The intro can display behind- or below the menu, at any height, and you can include page context items. [demo1] [demo2]

items.inlinetitle:
启用

Intro Enabled

Enable the intro background plugin globally.

* You also need to populate the source field to enable the intro plugin.

items.title:
源 [image, color or gradient]

Intro Source

Add a path to an image that will be used as background in the intro area, or use a solid color or a gradient.

Image

Include the path to the image you want to use as background in the intro area. Normally, you would use a full-size image in cover mode, but you can also use a repeating background image. Examples:

/path/to/imagename.jpg
Link to an image in a folder relative to your website root.

Color

You can also use a solid color background, for example #FFC000 or tomato.

Gradient

You can also use CSS gradients, for example linear-gradient(red, orange) or radial-gradient(farthest-corner, yellow, #f06d06).

* CSS gradients are very powerful, but we can't cover all the syntax here.
** Add gradients without vendor-prefixes.

* developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Images/Using_CSS_gradients
* www.w3schools.com/css/css3_gradients.asp
* uigradients.com

items.inlinetitle:
自定义高度

Custom Height

* Custom height is required if you are using a color or gradient source.

Select this option to set a custom height for the intro area. When this setting is enabled, you will also see options position and size for the background source. If custom height is disabled, height will adjust to image-size.

  • Disable custom height if you want to display a fully visible image.
  • It is recommended to enable custom height if you are using a repeating background pattern.
  • Custom height always applies when source is set to solid color or gradient.
  • Width of the intro area is always 100%.

items.title:
高度 [% or px]

Intro Height

Set the height of the intro as a percentage of the visible viewport, or at a fixed px height.

背景尺寸

Background Size

Background size decides how the source scales within the intro area. Mainly used for image sources, but may have some effect on gradients also.

auto
Your background image will display at original size. Use this option if you have a repeating background pattern, or if you don't want the image to scale to fit screen.

cover *default
Scale the background image so that the intro area is completely covered. Some parts of the image may not be in view within the intro area.

contain
Scale the image to the largest size such that both its width and its height can fit inside the intro area. * Normally does not look nice, as it means the image will repeat within the intro area.

[width] [height]
Set custom width and height values (using units %, px or vw/vh). The first value sets the width, the second value sets the height. If only one value is given, the second is set to "auto".

CSS Background Size
www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_background-size.asp

* Size does not apply for solid colors.

auto,cover,contain

背景位置 [x, y]

Background Position

Set the starting position for the background image. Since the image normally gets cropped within the intro area, position is set to center 50% 50% by default.

CSS Background Position
www.w3schools.com/cssref/pr_background-position.asp

* Position does not apply for solid colors.

items.inlinetitle:
固定 [no scroll]

Fixed mode

Creates a cool effect where the background image remains fixed when scrolling.

Warning!
When using fixed background, position- and size may not work as expected. This is because the browser positions- and scales the background relative to the browser viewport when using fixed attachment. This may be especially noticeable with the sidebar layouts.

* Fixed mode does not apply when using a solid color.
** Fixed mode does not work for mobile devices, so the background will scroll as usual.

items.helpvalue:
在介绍里显示

Show title, description and content in intro

This setting allows you to display page context items title, description and content directly in the intro area.

Notes

  • Items which are included, will be removed from their original location.
  • If you are including substantial content, you need to make sure your specificed intro height is sufficient. Content will not be scrollable within the intro area.
  • Items will be set to white color variations by default. If you need to change the styles, you will need to apply custom CSS.

Tip!

There is a hidden method to extract other html from your content: Simply add a div container in your content, with the image-intro-content class, and it will automatically be added into the intro area. For example:
<div class=image-intro-content>Your content here</div>

items.inlinetitle: 标题
描述
内容

覆盖菜单

Overlay Menu

When enabled, menu will overlay the intro, which is attached to top of page. When disabled, the intro is attached below the menu.

* Overlay menu only applies for topbar layouts.

items.title:
菜单样式

Menu Style

Since the main menu is overlaying the intro, we use white text on a semi-transparent dark background by default, to make sure the menu remains visible.

normal
Keeps the default menu colors. Often, this will not create enough contrast to layer the menu on top of the intro.

white
Sets the menu text color to white, which makes the menu optimally visible when layered above the intro.

white on 12% black * default
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 12% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu. This is often required to make sure the menu is visible when layered on top of the intro.

white on 25% black
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 25% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu.

items.inlinetitle:
隐藏上下文

Hide Context

A shortcut to entirely hide page context (title, description, content) when intro plugin is enabled.

隐藏页脚

Hide Footer

A shortcut to hide the footer when intro plugin is enabled.

items.title: 背景

items.helpvalue: 添加背景图像，渐变或颜色与背景插件. [demo]

items.inlinetitle:
启用

Background Enabled

Enable or disable the background plugin for this page.

* You also need to set either source or background color.

items.title:
背景源 [image or gradient]

Background Source

Add an image or gradient as source of the background.

Image

Include the path to the image you want to use as background. Normally, you would use a full-size image in cover mode, but you can also use a repeating background image. Examples:

imagename.jpg
Link to an image inside the current folder.

/path/to/imagename.jpg
Link to an image in another folder relative to your website root.

Tip! Name your background-image file with double __underscore to prevent it from displaying in the page gallery module. For example __imagename.jpg.

Gradient

You can also use CSS gradients, for example linear-gradient(red, orange) or radial-gradient(farthest-corner, yellow, #f06d06).

* CSS gradients are very powerful, but we can't cover all the syntax here.
** Add gradients without vendor-prefixes.

* developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Images/Using_CSS_gradients
* www.w3schools.com/css/css3_gradients.asp
* uigradients.com

背景颜色 [optional]

Background Color

Add a background color. The background color will only be visible if you are not using a background source, if if the source is non-repeating or semi-transparent.

背景重复

Background Repeat

Decides if background source will be repeated. By default, a background-image is repeated both vertically and horizontally.

CSS Background Repeat
www.w3schools.com/cssref/pr_background-repeat.asp

背景尺寸

Background Size

Background size decides how the background image scales. Mainly used for image sources, but may have some effect on gradients also.

auto
Your background image will display at original size. Use this option if you have a repeating background pattern, or if you don't want the image to scale to fit screen.

100% *default
Scale the background image to cover width of screen.

[width] [height]
Set custom width and height values (using units %, px or vw/vh). The first value sets the width, the second value sets the height. If only one value is given, the second is set to "auto".

CSS Background Size
www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_background-size.asp

auto,100%,cover,contain

背景位置 [x, y]

Background Position

Set the starting position for the background image. Default starting position is center top 50% 0%.

CSS Background Position
www.w3schools.com/cssref/pr_background-position.asp

* Position does not apply for solid colors.

items.inlinetitle:
固定 [no scroll]

Fixed mode

Creates a cool effect where the background image remains fixed when scrolling.

Warning!
When using fixed background, position- and size may not work as expected. This is because the browser positions- and scales the background relative to the browser viewport when using fixed attachment. This may be especially noticeable with the sidebar layouts.

* Fixed mode does not apply when using a solid color.
** Fixed mode does not work for mobile devices, so the background will scroll as usual.

items.title:
依附到

背景依附

将背景附加到页面或内容.

page
When attached to page, the background will start from top of page and the main menu will overlay the background. You will have a few options to style the menu.

content
When attached to content, the background will start from your page content.

菜单样式 [topbar only]

Menu Style

Since the main menu is overlaying the background, you can choose from a few special menu styles, to make sure the menu remains visible over the background.

* Menu styles only apply for topbar layouts

normal * default
Keeps the default menu colors.

white
Sets the menu text color to white, which may make the menu more visible when layered above a background.

white on 12% black
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 12% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu.

white on 25% black
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 25% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu.
视频介绍

items.helpvalue:
使用 视频介绍插件 在你页面添加视频介绍. [demo]

Video Intro Plugin

* Apply this plugin from your PAGE-settings. Here is only for default settings.

The video-background plugin allows you to use a video as page background. This plugin can be useful on your home page, or to emphasize certain special pages. To add a video-background to any page, simply upload an mp4 video file, and set the video source.

[see demo]

Limitations

  • Does not work on mobile
    Unfortunately, the video-background does not work on mobile devices for several reasons. Instead, there is a fallback for mobile devices. * See details in mobile fallback section below.
  • Video Cropped
    As you may understand, for a background video to display nicely at any height, on any device, on any screen aspect, the video may be cropped appropriately to 'fit' the designated stage area.
  • Does not work for sidebar layout
    Because of the huge technical difference of this layouts, the video intro plugin currently only works for the topbar- and slidemenu layouts.
  • H.264 encoded mp4 format
    Video in HTML5 is limited by various file formats and codecs. To be sure that your video displays properly across all browsers, the video should be encoded in H.264 codec, in mp4 format [ref].
  • 2MB Upload Limit
    Your host may have a 2MB upload limitation, in which case you would need to upload large video files by FTP into appropriate folders.
  • Browser remembers play-state
    If a visitor clicks to 'pause' the video, the video will also be paused next time the page loads. This is just common sense.
  • Results of slow internet
    If your video file is large, and the visitor is on a relatively slow connection, they may see the video start- and stop frequently while buffering.
  • Autoplay disabled
    Some visitors have simply disabled autoplay from their browser, in which case the video simply won't autoplay.
  • Loop stitch
    Don't expect the video loop to stich seamlessly on all browsers, even if your video is made to do so. Depending on the browser, it might take several milliseconds before the video starts re-playing.

Mobile Fallback

For several obvious reasons, background-video will not display for mobile devices, and will instead display the poster image (or poster-mobile image), which is an acceptable fallback.

  • Most mobile devices (including iphone/ipad) do not allow autoplay, mainly to prevent unsolicited cellular download. There is no "fix" for this.
  • Even if the video was loaded in pause-mode, clicking the native play button would open the video in a player-window, so it wouldn't be a background video.
  • A video may require too much bandwidth, and will often stutter on mobile.

Recommendations

The background-video plugin is intended to be used as a motion-background to compliment the page content. Don't use video just because you can or because it looks nice. We recommend using a short, subtle video loop, without sound, lasting only a few seconds, and compressed at acceptable file size.

Useful Links:[1][2][3]

items.title:
菜单样式

Menu Style

Since the main menu is overlaying the video, we use white text on a semi-transparent dark background by default, to make sure the menu remains visible.

normal
Keeps the default menu colors. Often, this will not create enough contrast to layer the menu on top of the video.

white
Sets the menu text color to white, which makes the menu optimally visible when layered over the video.

white on 12% black * default
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 12% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu. This is often required to make sure the menu is visible when layered on top of the video.

white on 25% black
Sets the menu text color to white, and adds a 25% semi-transparent dark background behind the menu.

高度 [0-100 %]

Height

Set the height of the video-background as a percentage value of the screens visible viewport. By default, this value is set to 100, which sets the video to cover the entire visible stage area.

items.inlinetitle:
自动播放

Autoplay

Sets the video to autoplay once it is partially loaded.

切换播放按钮

Toggleplay

Displays a small play/pause button at the bottom of the video on mouse hover. It is strongly recommended to keep this button enabled, for visitors with motion-disorientation, autism and for many other reasons a visitor may not wish to download- and view a video in loop.

循环

Loop

Sets the video to loop.

静音

Muted

Mutes the video. Ideally, background-videos should be encoded without sound, to optimize file-size.

隐藏上下文

Hide Context

A shortcut to entirely hide page context (title, description, content etc) when this plugin is enabled..

隐藏页脚

Hide Footer

A shortcut setting to hide the footer when this plugin is enabled.

items.title: Fotomoto

items.helpvalue:
使用 Fotomoto 插件 添加 e-commerce 到你的网站. [demo]

Fotomoto Plugin

Integrate Fotomoto e-commerce seamlessly into your X3 website with this plugin.

Instructions

  1. Create a Fotomoto account.
  2. Enable X3 Fotomoto plugin.
  3. Add your Fotomoto Store ID.
  4. Done!

* Prices and product management is done from your Fotomoto Dashboard.

items.inlinetitle: 启用

items.title:
Fotomoto Store ID * 必须的

Fotomoto Store ID

Find your unique Store ID in your Fotomoto Dashboard.

Settings › Store Settings › Store Information.

items.inlinetitle:
默认启用所有画廊

Enabled by Default

When enabled, Fotomoto will automatically be enabled for all your galleries. To exclude some galleries, you can disable Fotomoto from Page settings › Plugins › Fotomoto.

When disabled, Fotomoto will by default be disabled for all your galleries. To enable Fotomoto for any gallery page, go to Page settings › Plugins › Fotomoto.

添加购买按钮的图像

Add Buy button to images

When enabled, X3 will automatically add "Buy" buttons to all images in your Fotomoto-enabled galleries.

When disabled, you will need to manually add "Buy" buttons to your images. This offers more control of style and layout for your buttons if required.

How to manually add "Buy" buttons

To add your own buy buttons, simply include a link in your image description (or title) with the fotomoto-buy class. For example:

<a href=# class="fotomoto-buy">buy</a>
<button class="button fotomoto-buy">buy</button>

Tip! Include your button html in Page settings › Image › Default Image Description to apply it to all images on the page without having to add to each image individually.

items.title: 购买按钮文字

仅在弹出显示

Only show buy button in Popup

When enabled, "buy-button" will only show in the X3 popup, which opens when a preview-image is clicked. The buy-button will not display for preview-images in the gallery layout.

Mobile devices * recommended
Since mobile devices don't support mouse-hover, buy-buttons need to overlay all images in your gallery-layout, often resulting in an unattractive and cramped interface. Unless you have selected "Yes" (ALL devices), we therefore recommend "Mobile devices" so that buy-buttons only appear in the popup for mobile devices.

Fotomoto 收藏 * optional

Default Collection

Add new images to a specific Fotomoto collection by including the collection name.

* Leave blank to use default collection assigned from Fotomoto.

items.inlinetitle:
禁用小型移动设备 * recommended

Disable for small mobile devices

Unfortunately, the Fotomoto interface is not yet suitable for small touchscreen devices. We strongly recommend this setting until Fotomoto provides an improved interface.

* Fotomoto will still be enabled for tablets/iPad and up.

items.title: Audio Player

items.helpvalue:
使用 音乐播放器 插件在你网站包含音乐.

Audio Player

Simply upload one or more mp3 files to the folder custom/audio, and enable the audio player plugin. If you add multiple files, the tracks will be played as a playlist.

Warning

  • Only include audio if you really need to. Audio on websites is not considered good practice [ref], and will hog the bandwidth of your visitors.
  • Recommended to use subtle audio tracks at minimal file size.
  • If your server is limited to 2MB max_filesize for uploads, you will need to upload mp3 files to the content/custom/audio folder by FTP.

items.inlinetitle: 启用

自动播放 * Does not work for mobile devices

Autoplay

Audio will autoplay on page-load.

Warning

  • Autoplay does not work for mobile devices [ref].
  • Autoplay only works if the browser window/tab is in focus.
  • It is considered "bad practice" to autoplay audio [ref].
  • The autoplay setting will be nullified by the visitors last play-state (stored in browser). If the visitor stopped the audio player on their previous visit, the audio player will not autoplay when they re-visit the website.

循环

Loop

Loops the audio track or playlist.

随机播放列表

Shuffle

Shuffle playlist. When disabled, playlist will be sorted alphabetically by file name.

* This setting has no effect if there is only one track.

items.title:
音量 [0.1 - 1.0]

Volume

Set relative volume for the audio player. We recommend keeping this to default, since you have no way of knowing the visitors device volume, and they can normally adjust the volume themselves.

items.inlinetitle:
禁用小型移动设备 * 推荐

Disable for small mobile devices

It is recommended to disable the audio player for small mobile devices (smartphones).

Why is this recommended?

  • Audio player will hog bandwidth, which is significant if the user is not on wifi.
  • Audio player will drain battery power.
  • Audio cannot autoplay on mobile devices anyway.
  • Audio quality is relatively poor and will not reflect beneficially for your website.
  • Unlikely that visitors will want to play audio from their smartphone.
  • There simply is not much room on tiny screens for unnecessary buttons that get in the way of the interface.

* This setting does not affect tablets/ipad etc.

items.helpvalue: 自定义页脚
这部分是用来添加自定义HTML到你的网站的页脚X3.

items.title:
自定义页脚 [html]

Custom Footer

This field is used to add custom html to the footer of your X3 website. Normally, you can just add-, edit- or remove links in the icon-buttons section.

Icon Buttons

The icon-buttons container is reserved for the round icon buttons in your footer. Their main purpose is to link to your social accounts, but feel free to add any other links. Colors, Icons and Titles are built-in for most popular social services, but you can easily add your own. If you don't want any icon-buttons, just remove the links.

Usage

<a href="LINK" data-icon="ICON" data-color="#AABBCC" title="HELLO"></a>

* Get icon name at Font Awesome

Built-in Support

The following services have built-in support, so you don't need to set the data-icon, data-color or title: 500px, amazon, contact, codepen, delicious, deviantart, dribble, facebook, feed, flickr, foursquare, github, google+, instagram, linkedin, mail, paypal, pinterest, reddit, skype, soundcloud, spotify, stackoverflow, stumbleupon, tumblr, twitter, vimeo, vine, vkontakte, weibo, wordpress, youtube, xing

Popup

To use the popup window for a link, simply add data-popup:

<a href="LINK" data-popup></a>

... or set popup content directly in the link with data-popup-content:

<a data-popup-content="Your <strong>content</strong> here."></a>

items.helpvalue: 自定义代码
添加自定义代码的高级部分.

items.title:
自定义 CSS [CSS]

Custom CSS

Add your custom CSS here, available globally in your X3 website. You can override X3 styles, or add your own classes to be used in your content or applied to modules.

* Don't include <style></style> tags, as they will be applied automatically.

自定义 Javascript [JS]

Custom Javascript

Add custom javascript here, which will be loaded into the page.

X3 Event Handlers

In addition to custom javascript, you can also utilize X3 event handlers to execute javascript after certain events:

x3_load()

This function executes once the X3 application is fully loaded and ready. This also means jQuery has been loaded and is available to be used. Example:

function x3_load(){
  console.log('Runs after x3 is loaded, jquery available.');
}
x3_load_page()

This function executes every time an X3 page loads through Ajax. The function therefore triggers for each page load. Example:

function x3_load_page(){
  console.log('Runs after each X3 ajax page load');
}

* Don't include <script></script> tags, as they will be applied automatically.

自定义 <head> [html]

Custom <head>

Use this field to add custom html to the <head> section of your X3 website. This can be used to include meta tags for 3rd party services, custom counters, or for loading external CSS- or Javascript files. Example:

<meta name="p:domain_verify" content="xxxxxxx"/>

联系表格控件 [html]

Contact Form, Mega Menu

Customize the contact form for the topbar mega menu. You can edit the placeholder attribute texts, and the button text, but you should keep the rest.

* The fields with 'honey' are included to prevent spam, and should not be removed.

items.helpvalue: Add account ID's for various 3rd party services. Mainly used as meta tags in the source code to identify your connection with various services.

items.helpvalue: 邮箱设置
无论是X3的网站和X3面板邮件设置.

items.title:
收件人

Mail Recipient

This is where incoming e-mails will be directed. Add your e-mail address here.

Multiple Recipients
Separate multiple recipients by commas. For example:

john@doe.com, peter@gmail.com

发件人

Email From

Most hosts require a FROM email, which can often be the same as the recipient address.

Shouldn't FROM be set to the email of the visitor who sends the message?
No. Technically it is NOT the visitor who is sending the email, but your SERVER on behalf of your email settings. Therefore, the FROM email should be set to an email that is allowed to send on your behalf. The REPLY-TO email will still be set to the email of the visitor.

邮件主题 [template]

Subject Template

Add your mail subject here using template values %domain% and %name%, which are replaced by the website domain and sender name respectively.

邮件正文 [模板]

Body Template

Add your mail body here using template values %name%, %email% and %message%. You can use basic html tags in the e-mail template.

Use SMTP

Sometimes, your host may not support a localhost mailer, in which case you may need to setup SMTP instead. SMTP allows you to send emails from a proper SMTP email service.

items.title: 登录类型

items.helpvalue: 登录详情
更改用户名或密码时，将自动注销。请务必记住您的新登录信息，然后点击保存。
数据库详情

关于面板数据库版本

面板数据库版本

The panel database version offers a few advantages: Create- users, manage users, and edit user profiles directly from the control panel.

* The panel database version does not have anything to do with the X3 frontend.

How to setup panel database version

  1. Create New Database
    Create a new database, typically from your server control panel, or from phpMyAdmin. You can use any database name, for example x3_panel.
  2. Test Connection
    Before saving database settings in the panel, you should verify your database connection with the X3 Database Connection Checker.
  3. Add Database Details
    Add database connection details to panel settings (this page). You will automatically be logged out from the panel after clicking save.
  4. Install Panel DB
    Proceed to the X3 /panel/install/ page, and install the X3 panel database.
  5. Login
    Login to the panel with your new admin credentials set from the install process.
  6. Delete install folder
    If everything works, log in by FTP, and delete the panel/install folder.

上传调整大小

Upload Resizer

Default settings for resizing images as they are being uploaded. If you disable the upload resizer, original uploaded images will not be resized. This feature is recommended to make sure original images are resized to a web-friendly format, as it is dysfunctional for the website to force 5000px 4MB images.

* Images will often scale down additionally for certain layouts and/or devices, so the resize just sets the maximum 'large' image size.

Manual Resizing

You can disable the upload resizer if you are manually resizing images to a web-friendly format prior to upload from your application of choice. In fact, manual resizing is recommended if you are familiar with the process already, because it offers better quality control. A general web-friendly format for original images, may be between 1280-2000px long side with 85-95 JPG compression, but it all depends on your requirements. For a good balance, we recommend 1600 px long-side, at compression-level 95, for high-quality images at acceptable file-size.

Resize to Width and Height

The resize to width- and height fields, represents the bounding box of what your images will be resized within. For example, a 4752 x 3168 px lanscape-aspect image will resize to width-limit 1600 x 1067, while a 3168 x 4752 portrait-aspect image, will resize to height-limit 1067 x 1600. Original aspect ratios will always be kept intact.

Compression

JPG images are highly compressed with minimal 'loss', which means the quality degrades to a certain degree. However, if you leave a high-quality compression (90-95), you won't normally be able to detect any loss of quality with the naked eye.

items.inlinetitle: 上传调整大小

items.helpvalue: 下面是默认大小调整配置值。如果您直接从上传接口中直接更改值，则将优先考虑这些值.

items.inlinetitle:
图像自动定位

Auto Image Orientation

When this setting is enabled, images will get rotated based on the image EXIF orientation value. Normally you don't need to enable this, because your images are likely already rotated correctly. This feature is mainly available to correct orientation for images taken on devices that store orientation in EXIF instead of actually rotating the image correctly.

items.helpvalue:
Cloudflare

Cloudflare Account Details

This option is only useful if you are using Cloudflare "extreme page caching", as outlined in this tutorial. If you are just using basic Cloudflare, normal Cloudflare will still work, and you can ignore this settings.
Add your Cloudflare account details if you want to use extreme page caching.
